channel.title: random thoughts on the way we R
channel.description: Recent content in random thoughts on the way we R

item.title: Making of the website: A tribute
item.description: The first person who must be thanked is Yihui Xie. Without him, none of this would have been possible. I don’t know how many times I had taken a peek at Yihui’s website while making this one. That blog is an inspiring one I must say. This is based on a theme by Yihui, Hugo Ivy Leo’s website based also on Hugo Ivy, gave me some inspirations along the way.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. Inline code You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
